revision.text:
'''OpenGL''' is a cross-platform, open-standard graphic library for hardware-accelerated rendering. Most Doom source ports which have true 3D rendering use OpenGL. [[ZDoom]] itself has two [[source port|derived ports]] featuring their own OpenGL renderer, the first of them was [[ZDoomGL]] (no longer maintained) and the second is [[GZDoom]], which is considered the current standard for hardware-accelerated ZDoom. [[ScoreDoom]] and [[Zandronum]] are in turn derived from GZDoom.
== See also == *[[:Category:OpenGL features|OpenGL features]]
=== External link === [http://www.opengl.org/ OpenGL.org] - a hub for OpenGL developers. [[Category:Glossary]][[Category:Technical aspects]]
